It allows you to store your parcel(s) in a secure storage unit,\n for ease of retrieval after shopping,\n and you\'ll get a password; that let\'s you gain access to your parcels). It let\'s you retrieve your parcel(s), your stored parcel(s)… when you done shopping,\n you just have to select the storage unit you placed your item(s) in, and provide your password.
When storing a parcel(s) in the storage unit…\n
Please remember to close your storage unit door afterwards; \n your storage unit will lock it self automatically. \nPlease check if your storage unit is locked.
When retrieving a parcel(s) in the storage unit…\n
Please remember to close your storage unit door afterwards; \n the storage unit will lock it self automatically.
Please Select a Menu item, \n by clicking a button on the left of your display.
Menu Items
Please record your password. \n
Password will hide in a minute and a half! \n
Please remain here for a moment till your password hides… \n
then get to your storage unit; within 3 and a half minutes.
